title: Will you get the end of season skin for placing gold+ in flex queue?
body: I went through all of the faqs for the flex queue and couldn't find an answer.  We're assuming this player doesn't play a single game of solo/duo queue.

replies.body:
The little start of season pop-up explaining the new queues and placements also states that you'll receive the victorious skin for reaching gold+ in either queue, so yes you'd receive the end of season skin if you were gold+ in flex.

They also stated there would be an extra reward for those who managed to place gold+ in both queues, although they didn't give any hints as to what.

The season just started, so there aren't any details regarding end-of-season rewards right now. These details usually aren't announced until later on in the season, so I recommend hanging out until then.

Let me know if you have any questions.
